oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Metropolitan Nashville Airport check-in counter, 1967 November
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Customers at the check-in counter of American Airlines at Metropolitan Nashville Airport, circa November, 1967. Forms part of Record Group 3. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Metropolitan Nashville Airport Authority--History--Sources; American Airlines, inc.
